item.chrysalis.heal.desc: Sets the player's health to the maximum value when right-clicked
item.chrysalis.fill_hunger.desc: Sets the player's hunger bar to the maximum value when right-clicked
item.chrysalis.give_resistance.desc: Gives the player infinite and maximum resistance when right-clicked
item.chrysalis.clear_effects.desc: Clears the player's status effects when right-clicked
item.chrysalis.teleport_to_spawnpoint.de: Teleports the player to their spawnpoint when right-clicked
item.chrysalis.kill_wand.desc: Instantly kills any entity that is hit with the Kill Wand
item.chrysalis.heal_message: Set player health to maximum health
item.chrysalis.fill_hunger_message: Set player hunger to maximum food value
gamerule.passiveGriefing: Allow non-destructive world interactions from mobs
gamerule.dragonGriefing: Allow for Ender Dragons to destroy blocks
gamerule.witherGriefing: Allow for Withers to destroy blocks
gamerule.destroyItemsInExplosions: In explosions, most items will be destroyed
gamerule.destroyItemsInExplosions.descri: Most items caught in explosions are lost in the explosion.
